thread.title: Life | Light them candles - we're 18 years old today & we've got some good news to share
thread.title_full: Life | Light them candles - we're 18 years old today & we've got some good news to share - entertainment.ie

author: entertainment.ie
title: Life | Light them candles - we're 18 years old today & we've got some good news to share
text:
18 years, 18 years, she got one of your kids, got you for 18 years.
Well, whoever is responsible for entertainment.ie is off the hook now as we've hit the ripe old age of 18, meaning we can drink, vote and do whatever we damn near please without having ma or da having a say.
Yes, this humble site had its first footsteps 18 years ago today, having been founded on August 7th 1997 but only emerging into the bright new world of the internet after a nice incubation period to become Ireland's largest entertainment website, a title which we still proudly hold today.
We like to think we've grown into our looks.
What's next? Following on from our recently launched podcasts, we've got some big plans in the pipeline which we don't want to spill the beans on just yet but let's just say that there'll be more in it for you than ever before (and it won't cost you nothing either).
To kick things off, check out this competition right here which includes a limited edition Mad Max: Fury Road set, tickets, movies & more , and stay tuned for more to come.
Whatever we do, know that we plan on digging up that TV, film, music and entertainment gold for you as we stride into adulthood with all the excitement of a student heading off to college for the first time.
For now however, let's take a look back to 1997 and see what was going down when we were still trying to understand why we couldn't use the internet AND call someone at the same time. Thank jaysis that's behind us.
How well do you remember 1997? Test your knowledge with this movie quiz to see how well you know the year of our birth.
